item.title: How to fix this donator command
item.dc:creator: @Avalon Avalon
item.description:
@Avalon wrote:

Change:

String otherPName = command.substring(4);

To:

String otherPName = command.substring(8);

The rest looks right I think, unless I’m missing something.

Read full topic

item.title: How to fix this donator command
item.dc:creator: @HiddenPker HiddenPker
item.description:
@HiddenPker wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“donator”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Andy”)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(4);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if (otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		writeLog(p.playerName, "donators");

donator = 1;
sM(“You have added “+p.playerName+” to the donator list”);
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to add to the list…”);
}
disconnected = true;
savegame(true);
}[/code]

I check the char files and the ;

character-donator = 0[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 09, 2009, 03:45:59 pm[/size][hr]anyone help???

Read full topic
